```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(quanteda)
library(tm)
```
```{r}
docs <- read_csv("paper_doc_data.csv")
corp <- corpus(docs$summary)
docnames(corp) <- docs$title
summary(corp)
```
```{r}
library(topicmodels)
dtm <- docs %>%
  unnest_tokens(word, summary) %>%
  anti_join(stop_words) %>%
  count(title, word, sort = TRUE) %>%
  cast_dtm(title, word, n)
dtm <- removeSparseTerms(dtm, 0.99)

r_lda <- LDA(dtm, k = 10, control = list(seed = 0))
r_lda
```
